Author: Mylo#8306
Content:
your last statement is correct CG.  however, the probability is no longer random because of "gigapool".  this led to eratic mining by some NNs, which from this no-longer-random-gigapool anomaly, would not have been the "standard" way. 
the "hunting" was created, so the erratic mining _greedy_ nature of mining big rewards, was contained to the "hunting miners" to compete against gigapool.   all notary mining is then not-erratic.   and the anomaly of big rewards is working - meaning that the chain doesn't suffer from erratic mining.
